register
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://universal-facial-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/authentication/customer/registration"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "universal-facial-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
